attributes.action: Halt the slide to a third world road system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enforce the repair of our roads to a safe condition within months, the last month of bad weather is being blamed by goverment and councils, but the condition of our roads is due to years of failure to maintain them, billions are taken from motorists, lorry drivers etc, use it to maintain our roads.
